name: Bloop (itch) (Yakondu)
description:
In Bloop, move the pieces into their correct positions to form a loop for the train. 

How to play:

Each piece has a number, this is how many moves the piece MUST make

Use the text input to move the pieces using the syntax "move " e.g  "move a1 up" then hit return (or enter) to enter your command.

The aim is to use every pieces amount of moves so that they end up in a horizontal line, ready for the train to pass: see the last screenshot for a visual of what you are aiming for!

Music: "Minimalistic Loops" by gooseninja:

https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalistc-loops
